name: happy-hour-here-we-go-again-2
title: Happy Hour: Here We Go Again
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• There are really only two significant things in the news today, which means your Happy Hour is going to be short! The Cumberland is expected to crest right around flood stage (40 feet) tonight at midnight. While this is still a good 12 feet below the May flood level, some low-lying areas like Pennington Bend could see some problems. [WTVF]
  • So, Hands On Nashville is already on the scene sandbagging this afternoon and they’ve put out the call for volunteers to help. Details here, here, here and here.
  • But hey, at least our unemployment rate is back down into the single digits. [WPLN]
